sentences.sentence: After a week of fierce criticism from his opponents, French President Macron said he defended his rude remarks about France's unvaccinated people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: According to the Kazakh authorities, 2,500 Russian-led troops have arrived in Almaty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: President Kasim Domartokaev requested help from the Collective Security Treaty Organization, a regional military coalition, after violence escalated between anti-government protesters and security forces in the financial capital Almaty on Wednesday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Kazakh officials have insisted troops from the aliens will only be there to protect government institutions.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: But President Tokayev's televised address on Friday has spread concerns as he referred to those involved in the turmoil as terrorists and bandits.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: He had ordered the police and army to kill.

sentences.sentence: We've made clear that we condemn violence committed by anyone, including violence directed at the institutions of the state and government.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: We're seeking to learn more about it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: What's happening there is different from what's happening on Ukraine's borders.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Despite the threats and the widespread internet and communications blackout, Kazakh citizens have continued to release videos of protests in Almaty.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Kazakhstan's interior ministry reported 26 people have already been killed in the tumult.

sentences.sentence: The organization's foreign affairs ministers met on Friday via video link to try and figure out how to tackle Moscow's military buildup in and around Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The Western alliance is concerned by the risk of a military conflict should diplomatic efforts to de-escalate the crisis fail.

sentences.sentence: JENS STOLTENBERG, NATO Secretary General The whole idea that Ukraine is a threat to Russia is to put the whole thing upside down. Ukraine is not a threat to Russia. I think if anything, it is the idea of a partner, to a sovereign nation, but also, of course, recognizing that Ukraine is a partner, not a NATO ally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Moscow claims Ukraine as part of its sphere of influence and wants reassurances that it won't be allowed to join the Western military alliance. That demand has been flat out rejected by the U.S. and NATO, which point to the right of all nations to choose their own alliances.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: EU leaders, however, have been more reserved on Ukraine's prospect of NATO membership.

sentences.sentence: Next week, the Ukraine crisis will be the subject of intense diplomatic activities, with top representatives of the U. the US and Russia meeting in Geneva.

Like much of Europe, France is paying the price of the rapid spread of the highly contagious Omicron variant. Over the last week, the country has recorded an average of more than 200,000 cases per day, with over 300,000 new cases counted on Friday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Italy, like many other European countries, has seen a surge of new Covid cases due to the Omicron variant. To slow infection rates, an appeal has been made to Prime Minister Mario Draghi to suspend face-to-face classes in schools for two weeks.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Actor Sidney Poitier has died aged 94.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The award-winning Hollywood star was the first black performer to win an Oscar for Best Actor.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Although he was born in Miami, he was raised on a farm in the Bahamas before moving back to New York at the age of 16.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He took acting lessons and worked his way up, becoming a director after many years on stage and screen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Poitier's death was confirmed in a tweet by the Bahamas Minister of Foreign Affairs, Fred Mitchell.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A gifted actor and committed anti-racist campaigner, Poitier became the first black winner of an Academy Award for Best Actor for his part in Lilies of the Field.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: In an era when racial segregation was still widespread in the US, he played a black man with a white fiancée in Guess Who's Coming to Dinner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: And for in the heat of the night, he took on the role of Virgil Tibbs, a black police officer facing up to racism during a murder investigation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The 64th annual Grammy Awards show has been postponed. The event, generally considered

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: the Oscars of Music, was expected to take place on the 31st of January in Los Angeles in front of a live audience. The organisers have not yet announced a new date for the show but said that there are too many risks due to the Omicron variant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Jazz keyboardist John Baptiste has the most nominations with 11.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Olivia Rodrigo, Lil Nas X, Billie Eilish, Justin Bieber and Doja Cat are all up for the main awards.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The Sundance Film Festival has also cancelled its in-person programming.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It should have taken place in a few weeks in Park City, Utah as a hybrid online event, but it will now be entirely virtual.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Founded by Robert Redford, the Sundance Film Festival has become a centre for independent movies from around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Festival organisers said it was a difficult decision to make.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The exhibition entitled The Paris of Brasail – Photos of the City Picasso Loved, currently showing at Malaga's Picasso Museum, displays the work of one of the most famous European photographers from the 20th century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The prolific creator also went beyond photography and is renowned for designing books, drawing nudes and carving sculptures.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Paris through Brasai's lens is an exciting invitation into 1930s and 40s France.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Until late February, the Vuitton Foundation is presenting the Morozov Collection.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's a treasure trove of the world's most important impressionist and modern art paintings.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The exhibition has more than 200 masterpieces of French and Russian art, brought together by the Moscow-born Morozov brothers in the early 20th century.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's the first time since its creation that this collection has travelled outside of Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: And until the end of January, the Istanbul Modern is hosting the Artists' Film International programme.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The highlights include feature videos, animations and short films by artists from around the world.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Following the success of the online exhibition of the Artists' Film International by the Whitechapel Gallery, Istanbul Modern is now presenting the programme in a temporary space.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: The theme of the programme this year is care, an important message for the year to come.
